description.ko: 빛과 절대적 어둠의 경계가 고요한 천체의 심연 속으로 사라지는, 우주에서 가장 먼 곳에 대한 몰입형 탐구입니다.
description.en: An immersive exploration of the universe's furthest reaches, where the boundary between light and absolute darkness dissolves into a silent, celestial abyss.

prompt: A hyper-realistic cinematic rendering of the cosmic deep, VOID-3 aesthetic, swirling abyssal nebulae in shades of midnight blue and obsidian, scattered glowing stardust like bioluminescent particles, a distant dying star casting long shadows through dark matter, infinite depth perception, 8k resolution, photorealistic textures of space-time ripples.
